M_Course.Title: Fundamentals DSGVO
M_Course.Description_long: In this course you'll learn essential aspects of GDPR, focusing on Data Protection Impact Assessments (DPIAs), designing systems with data protection in mind, appointing a Data Protection Officer (DPO), handling cross-border data transfers, understanding data subject rights, breach notifications, accountability measures, and managing sensitive data. It's crucial for organizations to grasp these advanced concepts to ensure compliance and safeguard individuals' privacy rights.
M_Course.Description_short: The course navigates GDPR essentials for compliance and privacy protection.
